review: I purchased this when it was released for $19.00 for Prime Members.  After using this, and comparing the cost of xfinity monthly HD service, I decided to pull the plug on cable and use this for streaming Netflix, Hulu Plus, and of course Amazon prime shows.  I now have two sticks, one for each TV in the house with streaming service.  I now watch only the shows that I enjoy, and instead of surfing mind-numbing TV shows at night I read more often - that is a good thing.  Not to mention the $900 a year that I now saving after dropping cable.The interface is extremely easy to use, my 5 year old son can use it to get the shows that he wants (and is allowed to watch!).  Shows load amazingly fast using Prime Service, and with very limited initial buffering on other streaming services.We have kindles and fire phones, and the interaction between the Fire TV Stick and other Prime services is seemless and a plus - with a click I can show a slideshow of pictures and video's from the cloud, "flick" movies and video's from my kindle to the TV screen (which is also useful for putting a new kids show on the screen from another room using my kindle!).
